previewArticle.title: Colombia vs. Greece: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group C Preview

recapArticle.title: Colombia 3, Greece 0: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group C Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Kyle Young
timelineItems.text: I'm going for Greece over Columbia. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: #ajacied
timelineItems.text: "@mjdrinkwater: My view. #worldcup2014 #ColvGre #mineirao http://t.co/OJ1j6gXGAg"

timelineItems.name: #ajacied
timelineItems.text: "@mjdrinkwater: My view. #worldcup2014 #ColvGre #mineirao http://t.co/OJ1j6gXGAg"

timelineItems.name: Matt Oswin
timelineItems.text: A Mexican Wave 8 minutes in when you're one up? Really? #WorldCup #COLvGRE

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Víctor Ibarbo (Colombia).
Vasilis Torosidis (Greece) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Ghaxan khan
timelineItems.text: That was the fastest goal Colombia have ever scored in a #WorldCup match. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. José Holebas (Greece) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans
timelineItems.text: #GRE will have to come out a bit here to respond, and they seem to be doing so in the last few minutes #COLvGRE

timelineItems.comment: Juan Zuñiga (Colombia) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Dasean E Barnes
timelineItems.text: Columbia is DEEP! Lol #COLvGRE #columbia #greece

timelineItems.name: Francisco X. Rivera
timelineItems.text: Kostas Katsouranis is the only "survivor" from the Greece team that shocked Portugal in the Euro 2004 final in Lisboa. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Dirk Snider
timelineItems.text: Diving and over embellished "injuries". C'mon gents don't be sissies, man up and play. #WorldCup2014 #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Ann McGoldrick
timelineItems.text: What's our Kone doing playing for Greece thought he was injured ! At least we got Zinedine Kilbane with some decent commentary #COLvGRE

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Colombia. Juan Zuñiga tries a through ball, but Teófilo Gutiérrez is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Mark Batham
timelineItems.text: Is there a single Greek fan in this stadium? Just a sea of yellow. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Ankit Jha
timelineItems.text: Pablo Armero is the first Colombian to score a World Cup goal since Leider Preciado on 22 June 1998 (1-0 win vs Tunisia). #COLvGRE #FIFA14

timelineItems.name: Brett Callan
timelineItems.text: Colombia will not play by your rules, Greece. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Ibinabo Jack
timelineItems.text: "@FOXSoccer: That was the fastest goal Colombia have ever scored in a #WorldCup match. #COLvGRE"

timelineItems.name: Douglas Walls
timelineItems.text: So far, nice officiating by the US ref. #COLvGRE #worldcup

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. James Rodríguez (Colombia) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Abel Aguilar.

timelineItems.name: #TeamBrazil
timelineItems.text: Still early for Greece to be under pressure. They must just chill. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Sam WaIIiams
timelineItems.text: The Colombian fans in the stadium at Belo Horizonte are absolutely mental! #raucous #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: #TeamBrazil
timelineItems.text: Samaras is too deep into the midfield. #COLvGRE #2014FIFAWorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Víctor Ibarbo (Colombia).
Giannis Maniatis (Greece) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Mark Doig
timelineItems.text: There is an invisible man on the pitch. I keep seeing his shadow run across the pitch #COLvGRE

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Colombia 3, Greece 0.

timelineItems.name: Cheeky Backheel
timelineItems.text: Coffee beats the yogurt fad. #COLvGRE #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Sara Baeuchler
timelineItems.text: #COLvGRE ends 3-nil easily, hard to think Greece beat out some other countries who are currently absent after that display. #Brazil2014

timelineItems.name: Gareth John Davies
timelineItems.text: Decent game all in all. End to end stuff but Greece lacked quality. Ends 3-0 to Columbia. #COLvGRE #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.text: Man of the Match: http://t.co/vricZ6Trww #COLvGRE http://t.co/aVSVfBhQDw

timelineItems.text: Man of the Match: http://t.co/vricZ6Trww #COLvGRE http://t.co/aVSVfBhQDw

timelineItems.name: Cello ⚽
timelineItems.text: uhh what exactly is the Greek plan for this game? pass between defenders then knock it long. not seen one positive pass yet. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans
timelineItems.text: #COL have certainly fallen off here since their bright start - they definitely cannot allow #GRE to assert themselves here #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Bowyay
timelineItems.text: Greece need a little more one touch football to make something of this game #COLvGRE

timelineItems.comment: Georgios Samaras (Greece) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Carlos Sánchez (Colombia).

timelineItems.name: Solly Flox
timelineItems.text: Greece is playing to much. Attack the goal. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Matt Banks
timelineItems.text: Excellent showing from the #COL defence here, shutting down the #GRE offence before they can even get something moving. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Stevie Mc
timelineItems.text: Dirty Sanchez gets the first yellow felony card of the game. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Brandon Kostelecky
timelineItems.text: Watching #COLvGRE and can't help but feel that Greece's style of heavy passing/pos with no attack looks familiar � #RCTID

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Juan Zuñiga (Colombia).
Georgios Samaras (Greece) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Vasilis Torosidis (Greece) with an attempt from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by José Holebas with a cross following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: Soccer Gods
timelineItems.text: How does Samaras’ hair recover from a tackle like that? #COLvGRE http://t.co/vxY6Zki4Pz

timelineItems.name: Bowyay
timelineItems.text: Damn, Greece getting close, good show, good show #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Jim O'Leary
timelineItems.text: I can't tell if #GRE did that on purpose, but way to turn a corner into a throw in. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Ryan Nevill
timelineItems.text: why isn’t uncle Jesse Katsopolis getting the start for Greece today? #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Maddy Cat
timelineItems.text: Disappointed with the lack of Carlos Valderrama hair on the Colombians :€ #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Soccer Gods
timelineItems.text: We almost said Colombia looks decidedly better than Chile. Then the last 10 minutes happened. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Panagiotis Kone (Greece) right footed shot from outside the box is too high.

timelineItems.name: Randy
timelineItems.text: Perfect time for diplomatic relations, you have 2 USA refs, and 1 from Iran. #COLvGRE #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Tom Moore
timelineItems.text: This is the first game played in a stadium that actually looks Brazilian #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Nilesy ★
timelineItems.text: Greece is definitely not the word. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: FOX Soccer
timelineItems.text: Stat of the day? Greece have conceded a goal within the first 6 minutes in each of their three #WorldCup openers. (via @OptaFranz) #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella
timelineItems.text: 30': #Greece has looked better but just failing miserably in the final third. 1-0 #COL. #COLvGRE #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Juan Guillermo Cuadrado (Colombia) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Abel Aguilar.
Corner,  Greece. Conceded by Pablo Armero.

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans
timelineItems.text: #COL are absolutely deadly in the attack if they get going, but #GRE is so resolute and firm in defense...should be entertaining #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Ryan Croft
timelineItems.text: #COL will find it hard fulfilling their dark horse status without Falcao. #WorldCup #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Adam Kosnitzky
timelineItems.text: I am thinking Greece will ties this match shortly. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans
timelineItems.text: Teams are in the tunnel preparing to come out - anthems, handshakes and then we are off! #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Robbie Carr
timelineItems.text: the Greeks displaying a very strong beard game #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Mourinho's Lad
timelineItems.text: James Rodriguez, 22, of Colombia who plays for AS Monaco is a big baller. Watch out for him #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: AFS
timelineItems.text: Greece have lost (whilst failing to score) in 5 of their 6 #WorldCup games, winning only against Nigeria (2-1) in 2010 #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans
timelineItems.text: Belo Horizonte is packed with #COL supporters - this is certainly as close to a home fixture as they can get here #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Congrats again to Mark Geiger on getting tapped to officiate #COLvGRE. Two years ago he was still teaching AP Calculus in NJ.

timelineItems.name: Aaron West
timelineItems.text: So much pace and skill in this Colombia team. They might be the most fun team to watch in this tournament. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Sal Cipriano
timelineItems.text: Hostile environment for team Greece today at Belo. Going to be an uphill battle, but I'm predicting a draw of some sort. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans
timelineItems.text: I really do hope they continue the habit of letting the supporters finish the second half of the national anthems...great stuff #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Derek
timelineItems.text: Crowd at Belo Horizonte overwhelmingly in support of #COL, as to be expected. #WorldCup #COLvGRE http://t.co/SqMK3bOntz

timelineItems.name: Derek
timelineItems.text: Crowd at Belo Horizonte overwhelmingly in support of #COL, as to be expected. #WorldCup #COLvGRE http://t.co/SqMK3bOntz

timelineItems.name: LA♡
timelineItems.text: Columbia has got some speed. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: IG: bradleyzass
timelineItems.text: Corner comes to nothing...Come On Greece #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: g0dsgreen
timelineItems.text: No worries GRE, showing signs of offense is a good thing. #COLvGRE #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: aisha nassanga
timelineItems.text: No wonder the gods came from Greece...Kone! #ColvGre #SSFootball

timelineItems.name: Sal Cipriano
timelineItems.text: Greece is all decked out in their 300 beards. Ready to go down fighting! Won't doubt they take Columbia down with them! #COLvGRE

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Greece. José Holebas tries a through ball, but Theofanis Gekas is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: IG: bradleyzass
timelineItems.text: Columbia defending these corners pretty well so far. Greece not giving up. Great. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Andrew Colosimo
timelineItems.text: #COLvGRE Trivia: Socrates was a Greek philosopher. Sócrates was a Brazilian footballer. Sokratis Papastathopoulos is a Greek footballer

timelineItems.name: MartinsLeftLeg
timelineItems.text: Greece looking better and better. Colombia better get there act together or this game will run away from them. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Dread Pirate Rowdie
timelineItems.text: "Defending set pieces has been an Achilles Heel for the Greeks." Too soon! #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Jacob Gurera
timelineItems.text: #StopKone2014 #COLvGRE

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Colombia. Conceded by José Holebas.

timelineItems.name: EDO-kun
timelineItems.text: Colombia reminds me Brazil playing the debut game vs. Croatia. It just lacking an own goal like Marcelo of Brazil. #OneStadium #COLvGRE

timelineItems.text: Mark geiger actually managing to not be part of the story. #COLvGRE #worldcup

timelineItems.name: Brandon Devlin
timelineItems.text: Greece needs to get it together and score #FifaWorldCup #2014 #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Thomas Avery
timelineItems.text: World Football is better when Columbia is good. Such a fun team to watch. #COL #WorldCup #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Bowyay
timelineItems.text: what a shot Kone! Great save to match #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans
timelineItems.text: What a save from Ospina!!!! #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Adam J.
timelineItems.text: Still puzzled why this guy isn't in #GREECE starting 11. #COLvGRE #UncleStavros http://t.co/vl48K7XNL1

timelineItems.name: Rebecca Holliday
timelineItems.text: Great play and shot from Kone from Greece, and great save from Colombia. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Giuseppe Copertino
timelineItems.text: I really hope Lazio bring in Kone, he's a threat from anywhere. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Adam J.
timelineItems.text: Still puzzled why this guy isn't in #GREECE starting 11. #COLvGRE #UncleStavros http://t.co/vl48K7XNL1

timelineItems.name: Ryan Krasnoo
timelineItems.text: This Colombian crowd is seriously a spectacle though. You'd think they were the host country in South America. Sea of yellow. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Colombia 1, Greece 0.

timelineItems.name: Rafael hernandez
timelineItems.text: Greece seems to have struggled against a fast paced team like Colombia.. #COLVGRE

timelineItems.name: Sal Cipriano
timelineItems.text: YO, not for nothing, Greece looked better on the whole that half. Still saying this ends in a 1-1tie. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: BOG
timelineItems.text: Greece staying in this one. Lack the clinical finishing but have created plenty of chances. Colombia need a Chara. Fickle defense. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Ryan Krasnoo
timelineItems.text: The Colombian players turning to their crowd and urging them to get loud is something rarely seen in world football. Really cool. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Estuardo Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: You have to admit, #Greece is giving it all. The Colombian goalie has one advantage, he is not the #Spanish goalie. #COLvGRE 1-0 at the half

timelineItems.name: Saboor Khan
timelineItems.text: Great stuff right now. Really entertaining! #COLvGRE #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Edward Arnhold
timelineItems.text: #COLvGRE #GRE has had more possession than #COL. This second half should get interesting!

timelineItems.name: Carolina Z.
timelineItems.text: #COLvGRE #BH #mineirão #brasil2014

timelineItems.name: Barnabas Sackett
timelineItems.text: Columbia are playing too deep...They are lucky the Greek attacks are too slow to break them down #WorldCup2014 #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: CĦI (馳) őjiĺε̲я̩ε̲™
timelineItems.text: Interesting 1st half. Columbia leads by lone goal. Greece needs to bite harder. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Michael Widmer
timelineItems.text: Both teams continue pushing big numbers forward in attack. Will be plenty of counter opportunities both ways in the second half. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Marios C Sfantos Esq
timelineItems.text: Greece playing well, tempo serves them, self to blame for goal & for not having tied up. Colombia dangerous on right-side counters. #COLvGRE

Konstantinos Katsouranis (Greece) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Greece. Panagiotis Kone tries a through ball, but Kostas Mitroglou is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: James H
timelineItems.text: Trickle-down goalonomics works #COLvGRE #WorldCup ⚽️

timelineItems.name: Clarissa
timelineItems.text: That celebration was sick, but that goal was terrible. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Kostas Mitroglou (Greece) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Georgios Samaras.
Corner,  Greece. Conceded by Mario Yepes.

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans
timelineItems.text: Good effort from Mitroglou there...looked destined for the top corner actually...#COLvGRE

timelineItems.comment: James Rodríguez (Colombia) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Giannis Maniatis (Greece).

timelineItems.name: JimmyK
timelineItems.text: This game has been far more entertaining than you can ever have dreamed of #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: International soccer is better with Colombia in the upper echelon. Welcome back, Cafeteros. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: FootySF
timelineItems.text: Greece really missing the likes of Epicurus, Socrates, Archimedes, and "Chopper" Sophocles today. #COLvGRE #MontyPython

timelineItems.name: Ben Fast
timelineItems.text: Mitroglou is on about 65 minutes too late for Greece. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Tanner Worley
timelineItems.text: Credit to Columbia's GK. When called on today, he has shown up. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Giannis Maniatis (Greece) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Konstantinos Katsouranis.

timelineItems.name: Michael Widmer
timelineItems.text: Colombia's best defense is their attack. With how fast they get the ball forward, Greece regain possession around their own box. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Juan Guillermo Cuadrado (Colombia).
Sokratis (Greece) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Paul Jackson
timelineItems.text: The Greek players go down quicker than their economy #WorldCup2014 #COLvGRE

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Santiago Arias (Colombia) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Jackson Martinez.
Foul by Víctor Ibarbo (Colombia).
Giannis Maniatis (Greece) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Giannis Maniatis (Greece).
James Rodríguez (Colombia) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Matt Sliko
timelineItems.text: Still can't get over that "heroes play like Greeks" sign...so badass #COLvGRE #WC2014 #COL #GRE

timelineItems.name: Marios C Sfantos Esq
timelineItems.text: @Goesse Super dangerous but is Mitroglou match-ready psychologically post-injury, post-Fulham...? He needs to find old self fast. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.comment: Giorgos Karagounis (Greece) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Carlos Sánchez (Colombia).

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans
timelineItems.text: Karagounis comes on at the expense of the impressive Kone for #GRE - a little more midfield solidarity and bullish attitude here #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Adrian Melville
timelineItems.text: Real shame the Gekas hit that crossbar. Would have changed the whole dynamic of the last 30 minutes #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: James Cosgrove
timelineItems.text: Columbia vs Greece, a game you only watch at the World Cup #COLvGRE

timelineItems.comment: James Rodríguez (Colombia) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Panagiotis Kone (Greece).
Hand ball by Jackson Martinez (Colombia).

timelineItems.name: Time
timelineItems.text: Rodriguez and Cuadrado doing an amazing job. Even without Radamel Falcao Colombia is owning. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jackson Martinez (Colombia).
Giorgos Karagounis (Greece) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Cᵃˡˡ ᵐᵉLord Ken
timelineItems.text: #Yepes tiding things up #ColvGre

timelineItems.name: Robert Grabe
timelineItems.text: Love Geiger yelling "Knock it off!" At a Greek and Columbian who, likely, had no idea what he said. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Nathaniel
timelineItems.text: The Greeks look like Centurions! #COLvGRE #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: n loves zayn¨̮
timelineItems.text: ITS NOT FAIR :( WE'RE SO UNLUCKY WHY WHY WHY #WorldCup2014 #COLvGRE #GRE

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans
timelineItems.text: Yeps has been immense today - turning back the clock all match long just like Cahill yesterday #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Darryl Spittle
timelineItems.text: Gawd! There is not a jot of creativity in this Greece team. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Georgios Samaras (Greece) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans
timelineItems.text: Full marks to the Referee today on a side note - the American has been excellent throughout #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Paul Peters
timelineItems.text: Not their day but poor team selection has made a difference. #COLvGRE #Greece

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Giorgos Karagounis (Greece).
Jackson Martinez (Colombia) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Wm Michael Pierson
timelineItems.text: I want Columbia to win. But Greece is not lying down. #COLvGRE #LaFuriaRoja #Brasil2014 #chillaxed

timelineItems.name: RBNYTweets (Matt)
timelineItems.text: Geiger gives the rest of the world just what they crave deep down, a firm American hand administering them justice #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Soccer Gods
timelineItems.text: Our main problem w/big players is that they don’t flop easily or naturally. Hard to get the calls that those born for theater do. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Parker Kuklinski
timelineItems.text: They've completely run out of gas #COLvGRE #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: J-Fran
timelineItems.text: #Cuadrado looks a real player. #Brasil2014 #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Time
timelineItems.text: Opportunity for a 3rd goal but Martinez just ran and passed it by. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Mike Berg
timelineItems.text: American ref just officiated best game in Brazil yet. Just Saying. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Michael Widmer
timelineItems.text: Love Colombia's approach to protecting a lead. You can't score if you can't get the ball off us. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.comment: James Rodríguez (Colombia) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ioannis Fetfatzidis (Greece).
Foul by Giorgos Karagounis (Greece).
Juan Zuñiga (Colombia) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: FootySF
timelineItems.text: The quiet you hear is the sound of no plates being smashed. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Matt Sliko
timelineItems.text: Olympus has fallen #COLvGRE #WC2014 #COL #GRE

timelineItems.name: FOX Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL, Colombia! Rodriguez htis a third for Colombia just before the full time whistle. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans
timelineItems.text: And it's 3-0 #COL!! J-Rod has opened his account in Brazil!! He's been quite good today hasn't he! #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Jeremy Dzigas
timelineItems.text: Game Set Match Columbia with the three points #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Jonno Reilly
timelineItems.text: James Rodriguez is the best player I've seen at this #WorldCup so far. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: There’s the cherry. Coffee hat trick for Colombia. And THAT PASS. #COLvGRE

timelineItems.name: F. V. Banda
timelineItems.text: FALCAO WHO? 3-0 #COLvGRE #Brasil2014 #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Colombia 3, Greece 0.
